messages.title: Three great reasons to vote for George Smid on Thursday 7th May
messages.content: Your choice to have your voice heard - George is a local campaigner on local issues.
George stood as an MEP candidate in 2014 and says, "Britain should be leading Europe, not talking about leaving Europe"
George is fighting for better infrastructure (roads, broadband, flood defences), for better education (schools and libraries), for a better South Holland and The Deepings.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: George is fighting for better infrastructure including roads, broadband, and flood defences.
George is advocating for better education through improvements in schools and libraries.
George stood as an MEP candidate and believes Britain should be leading Europe, not talking about leaving it.

issues.brexitEurope: Britain should be leading Europe, not talking about leaving Europe.
issues.education: George is fighting for better education (schools and libraries).

contactInformation.address: Printed by Buxus Print and promoted by Kathleen Tanner on behalf of George Smid (Liberal Democrats), both at 38 Kingston View, Grantham Way Industrial Estate, Ryhall Road, Stamford, Lincs, PE9 1PR. Published and promoted by Kathleen Tanner on behalf of George Smid (Liberal Democrats), both at 38 Kingston View, Market Deeping, Peterborough, PE68DU
